name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

subjectId = #{subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scoreId = #{scoreid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lock = #{lock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, subjectId = #{subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
